Uses of Class
scotty.util.function.Optional

  • Packages that use Optional 
    Package Description
    scotty.database
    This package contains the data model database related code for Scotty.
    scotty.database.parser
    This package contains the parsing and internal code for the Scotty database.
    scotty.util
    Various utility classes used by Scotty.
    scotty.util.function
    This package functional programming code based on Guava, and Java 1.8.
